attributes.action: Let a Blue Peter competition design the New British Passport
attributes.additional_details:
The current government has diverted us from the Brexit cock-up by giving us a blue passport.
Apparently, we could have changed our passport all along.
That said, a new one would nice anyway. Please Let a Blue Peter Competition sort this mess out.
Blue Peter:
Information and reports from around the world.
First episode date: 16 October 1958
Location(s): Studio HQ7, MediaCityUK
Presented by: Gethin Jones, Ayo Akinwolere, Lindsey Russell, Radzi Chinyanganya
Theme songs: The Sailor's Hornpipe, Barnacle Bill, Drum and Fife
Networks: BBC, BBC One, BBC Television, CBBC
attributes.background:
Instead of the Blue Passport - Run a Blue Peter Competition
Blue Peter has long been the purveyors of well-regulated competitions with no cheating or fibbing allowed. Ideally placed for conducting a democratic process fairly for a change.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding which competitions Blue Peter will run. 

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to hold a national competition to decide the colour and design of the new UK passport, if that's what you want to happen.
